mapper.select: SELECT quantity FROM cart_item_table WHERE cart_id = #{cartId} AND product_id = #{productId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cart_item_table (cart_id, product_id, quantity) VALUES (#{cartId}, #{productId}, #{quantity})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM cart_item_table WHERE cart_id = #{cartId} AND id = #{itemId}
mapper.select: SELECT ci.id AS item_id, ci.product_id, p.name AS product_name, p.cover_url AS product_cover_url, p.price AS unit_price, ci.quantity, (p.price * ci.quantity) AS amount FROM cart_item_table ci JOIN product_table p ON p.id = ci.product_id WHERE ci.cart_id = #{cartId} ORDER BY ci.id DESC
